profileAlternative.name: Yossi Salmon
profileAlternative.headline: Senior Software Development Engineer, 2018-Technion Certified with honors-TCSD, C, C++, C#, Java, Python
profileAlternative.summary:
A proactive and dynamic resourceful professional with outstanding track record of success in developing & managing complex large-scale IT and Telecommunication projects,

Wealth of knowledge and Experience in C, C++, C#, Java, Python, PHP and Databases, with Strong system knowledge.

Strong Solution Architect and UML Design Expert, Experienced Implementer of complex software full stack projects, both server & client.

Interested in AI projects especialy Deep Learning Neural Networks, able to implement fast solutions using Python and TensoFlow.

Presentations in front of individuals and large audience, strive to continue and get specialize in the field

positions.title: Senior Software Development Engineer, Project Leading, C, C++, C#, Java, Python, PHP, Databases
positions.description:
• Design and Development of ASP.NET Web management application + Microsoft SQL server full design of entity relationship diagram (ERD) + implemented C# REST self-host API window service, CTI to Json - Citytimeil – 2018
• Python and Flask REST interface via Sales Force apex to manage outgoing calls - Kaltura – 2017
• Development of ActiveX interface to support customer self-implemented vb6 CRM screen popup - Maalot - 2017.
• IVR interactive voice response using VXML for the human resources contact center - Sheba – 2017
• A unique TCP-based windows service using C++ and libcurl to parse live data streaming - Kaltura-2017.
• Project manager for the HCS-hosted collaboration systems project - 2016 Project Cloud.
• BI2CALL dialer development - Telcar 2016.
• Development of CRM screen pop - Super Pharm 2015.
• Development of IVR MPS 500 - Teleall 2014.
• Development of historical and real-time SQL-based reports using crystal report as templates - Sheba - 2014.
• Development of the Call Back system - Excellence, Sheba, Migdal Capital Markets 2013.

…
see more

positions.title: Project Manager
positions.description:
• Real-time and Historical intelligence.
• Planning, developing, upgrading, installing and deploying applications.
• Expertizing with self-services applications.
• Active consultant.

positions.title: Military Officer, Major
positions.description: Company commander in contact battalion, 150 soldiers, RF systems installations, telecommunications installations and war rooms assembly.
